scripts.build: mkdir -p release/app/dist && npm run build:server && npm run build:app && cp -r ./views ./release && cp -r ./app/dist ./release/app
scripts.build:app: cd app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:app && tsc && npm run build:linux && npm run build:win && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p releases/linux/app/dist && pkg . --out-path ./releases/linux --targets node8-linux-x64 --options max_old_space_size=8192 && cp -r ./views ./releases/linux && cp -r ./app/dist ./releases/linux/app && npm run zip:linux
scripts.build:win: mkdir -p releases/win/app/dist && pkg . --out-path ./releases/win --targets node8-win-x64 --options max_old_space_size=8192 && cp -r ./views ./releases/win && cp -r ./app/dist ./releases/win/app && npm run zip:win
scripts.build:mac: mkdir -p releases/mac/app/dist && pkg . --out-path ./releases/mac --targets node8-macos-x64 --options max_old_space_size=8192 && cp -r ./views ./releases/mac && cp -r ./app/dist ./releases/mac/app && npm run zip:mac
